name: transcendence-frontend
description: Frontend for the Transcendence web application.

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist dist/templates dist/assets && cp -r src/assets dist && cp src/index.html dist && cp src/templates/*.html dist/templates && tsc && tailwindcss -i ./src/css/input.css -o ./dist/css/output.css
scripts.predev: mkdir -p dist dist/templates dist/assets && cp -r src/assets dist && cp src/index.html dist && cp src/templates/*.html dist/templates
scripts.dev: concurrently "tsc --watch" "tailwindcss -i ./src/css/input.css -o ./dist/css/output.css --watch" "chokidar 'src/index.html' -c 'cp src/index.html dist/index.html'" "chokidar 'src/templates/*.html' -c 'cp src/templates/*.html dist/templates/'" "browser-sync start --server 'dist' --files 'dist/**/*' --no-ui --port 4200 --reload-delay 10 --single"
